name: HelloMath
0:
”Alexa, open Hello Math”
”Alexa, start Hello Math”
”Alexa, launch Hello Math”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hello math
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hello Math is a mini-game for kids to practice elementary arithmetics. The user can choose from addition, subtraction, multiplication, division or mixed questions. Each round is made up of 10 questions, at the end of which a final score from 0-100 will be given. 
- Addition: the answer will be in the range from 0 to 100.
- Subtraction: the answer will be in the range from 0 to 100.
- Multiplication: the given numbers will be in the range from 0 to 10.
- Division: the answer will always be an integer from 1 to 10.

Have fun learning! :)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
